guild.description:
Humor, irony, exaggeration, or ridicule to expose and criticize people's stupidity or vices, particularly in the context of contemporary politics and other topical issues.

Satire sites
- https://babylonbee.com
- https://genesiustimes.com/

- https://thegloriousamerican.com/
- https://www.thebeaverton.com/
- https://www.sanguinepenguin.net/
- https://waterfordwhispersnews.com/

title: Rioters Patiently Wait For All The Votes To Be Counted | The Babylon Bee

body: that's kind of one positive side effect of this is that hopefully it diminishes the intensity of or presence of riots, if the election is dragged out and then the people could be distracted with something else like thanksgiving and Christmas
